exam.question: In the Spring Export Commodities Fair the ______ of fine china attracted much attention of customers from all over the world.

answer.explain: 句意： 在春季出口商品交易会上， 一系列精美的瓷器吸引了世界各地的顾客。 succession： 连续， 继承； string： 一串， 一行； procession： 行列。

sentences.sCn: 一大堆眼花缭乱的选择

sentences.sContent: ...But an array of countries are rushing to assert greater influence here...
...They are a vital part of an array of data that we use to assess if we're doing well or doing badly...
...a visit to a lighting store reveals a stunning array of choices...
...had an array of resources for its first-generation students...
...Common Ground's large residences in New York offer insight into the possibilities for change when homeless people have a rich array of supports...
...it still boasts an unequalled array of sunrise industries and the most brisk venture-capital industry on the planet...
...the impact will extend far beyond agriculture-locking up property rights in an array of important areas...
...have produced a perplexing array of options for obtaining them...

synos.tran: 数组，阵列；排列，列阵；大批，一系列；衣服

phrases.pCn: 一维数组；线性排列；[电磁]直线天线阵
感测器阵列；阵列传感器
探测器阵列；检波器组合
太阳能电池阵；太阳电池板；太阳组
(军队)列成战阵的，进入战斗序列的

trans.tranCn: 展示；陈列，一系列；排列，队形；衣服，盛装；
trans.tranOther: a set of numbers or signs, or of computer memory units, arranged in lines across or down
